trans-unit.source: Big Books are designed for teachers to hold and read in front of a class. For more information, see this PDF from Scholastic.
trans-unit.target: Ri nima’q taq wuj b’anom chi kech ri tijonelab’ rech kkichapo kkisik’ij uwach chi kiwach le tijoxelab’ pa ri tijonem. Para más información vea este PDF de Scholastic.

alt-trans.target: Ri nima’q taq wuj b’anom rech ri tijonelab’ kkichapo kkisik’ij uwach chi kiwach le tijoxelab’ pa ri tijonem. Rech uq’alajisaxik na chwila’ chi upam we ri’ PDF de Escolar .
Ri nima’q taq wuj b’anom rech ri ajtijonelab’ kkichipo kkisik’ij uwach chkiwach ajtijoxelab’ pa ri Tijonem. Para más información vea este PDF de Scholastic.
Ri nima’q taq wuj b’anom rech ri ajtijonelab’ kkichipo kkisik’ij uwach chkiwach ajtijoxelab’ pa ri Tijonem.

trans-unit.source: To make things more manageable, this template is set at A4 Landscape, with large fonts. You can easily produce books that are A3 (twice as large). Just take your A4 PDF to a printer and ask them to enlarge it to A3.
trans-unit.target: Rech kb’an kowinem chech ri sutaq, we uxe’ raqanib’al ukojik pa A4 Q’e’lik, ruk' nima’q taq uwach tz’ib’. Kkowinik kub’an wuj A3 ruk’ (kab’ichal unimal). Xuwi kk’am ub’ik ri PDF A4 pa jun tz’ajtz’ib’al wuj xuquje’ chta chi kech kkinimarisaj pa A3.

alt-trans.target: Rech kb’an kowinem chech ri sutaq, we uxe’ rqanib’al ukojik pa A4 q’e’lik, ruk' nima’q taq uwach tz’ib’. Kkowinik kub’an wuj A3 ruk’ (kab’chal unimal). Xuw kak’amub’ik ri PDF A4 pa jun tz’ajtz’ib’al wuj xuquje’ chta chike kkinimarisaj pa A3.

Rech kb’an kowinem chech ri sutaq, we uxe’ rqanib’al ukojik pa A4 q’e’lik, ruk' nima’q taq uwach tz’ib’. Kkowinik kub’an wuj A3 ruk’ (kab’chal unimal). Xuw kak’amub’ik ri PDF A4 pa jun tz’ajtz’ib’al wuj xuquje’ chta chike kkinimarisaj pa A3.
Rech kb’an kowinem chech ri sutaq, we uxe’ pa A4 suk’juch’ ruk' nima’q taq uwach tz’ib’.
Rech kb’an kowinem che ri sutaq, we uxe’ pa A4 suk’juch’ ruk nima’q taq uwach tz’ib’

trans-unit.source: If you are using a small screen, it can be hard to read the credits page. Try zooming in using the +/- zoom control at the top-right of your screen so you can edit it.
trans-unit.target: We katajin kakoj alaj uwach ilb’al wachaj, k’ax kariq chech usik’ixik uwach ri xeb'anowik. Chb’ana’ zoom ruk’ ri ukojik +/- ajsik pa uwikaq’ab’ rech uwach ilb’al rech katkowin chech ukolomaxik.

alt-trans.target: We katajin kakoj alaj uwach ilb’al wachaj, k’ax kariq chech usik’ixik uwach ri xeb'anowik. Chb’ana’ zoom ruk’ ri ukojik +/- ajsik pa uwikaq’ab’ re uwach ilb’al rech katkowin chech ukolomaxik.
We tajan kakoj laj uwo ilb’al wachaj, k’ax karaq che usik’ixik uwach ri xebanowik. Chb’ana’ zoom ruk’ ri ukojik +/- ajsik pa uwikaq’ab’ re uwo ilb’al rech katkowin che ukolomaxik.

trans-unit.source: This version includes an "Instructions for Teachers" page that is already filled out, in English. If you would like to have instructions in a different language, you can delete that text and type in your own. If you send us that text, we can include it in a future version of the template.
trans-unit.target: We katajin kakoj alaj uwach ilb’al wachaj, k’ax kariq chech usik’ixik uwach ri xeb'anowik. Chb’ana’ zoom ruk’ ri ukojik +/- ajsik pa uwikaq’ab’ rech uwach ilb’al rech katkowin chech ukolomaxik.

alt-trans.target: We katajin kakoj laj uwach ilb’al wachaj, k’ax kariq chech usik’ixik uwach ri xeb'anowik. Chb’ana’ zoom ruk’ ri ukojik +/- ajsik pa uwikaq’ab’ reche uwach ilb’al rech katkowin chech ukolomaxik.
We tajan kakoj laj uwo ilb’al wachaj, k’ax karaq che usik’ixik uwach ri xebanowik. Chb’ana’ zoom ruk’ ri ukojik +/- ajsik pa uwikaq’ab’ re uwo ilb’al rech katkowin che ukolomaxik.
